name: Chaotic Cryo
description:
R: Reload

Jump: Space

A: Move Right

D: Move Left

Mouse: Shoot

A virus has ravaged the world, it mutated faster than the populus could handle. One deadly mutation changed everything, mechanical signals brought the deceased back giving them a second chance to infect the few remaining survivors. Interacting with any machinery was enough to give them new life. A lone survivor remains humanity's last hope. His only chance to bring humanity back from the brink is to collect enough DNA, stored in cryo pods, and return them to his refrigerator for safe keeping.

Programming: Canttuchdiz

Art & Music: Foster Turtle
